title: (x) little burgundy font : what is it - similar to Berlin Sans {self (Rosemère)}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130830192659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture7_6055.jpg)

does anybody know what font is this.  
I like the curves, the boldness and the letter Y

comments.content:
Funny how it looks like a modified Berlinsans demi
